description: On Fedora 40 Plasma 6.1 out of the box it starts full screen with a migraine inducing flashing border. Immediately uninstalled as there are so many Tetris clones available I saw no point in trying to fix the flashing. Who knows it might be a great implentation, but I will probaly never get so far as actually playing it...
summary: Terrible video settings out of the box

description: it is responsive and colorfull, with kind of a nintendo NES look. nice

Loads and crashes. 
Here's my error log: https://gist.github.com/derak-kilgo/c100590d2be1d4b1d1d057a709c0f0d1

Best version of Tetris on here and looks like the classic game. But the Help option opens a web browser and doesn't teach the controls. It instead suggests that you select the Help option to learn the controls. This is cute and useless.
summary: Looks cool but still not great
